thread.title: Ashley Graham straddles jet ski in revealing red swimsuit during wet and wild photoshoot in Miami
thread.title_full: Ashley Graham straddles jet ski in revealing red swimsuit during wet and wild photoshoot in Miami

author: Jessica Gibb
title: Ashley Graham straddles jet ski in revealing red swimsuit during wet and wild photoshoot in Miami
text:
Ashley Graham straddles jet ski in revealing red swimsuit during wet and wild photoshoot in Miami The ANTM judge put her famous curves on display Share Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing!   
Ashley Graham gave Baywatch a run for its money as she took to the beach in Miami today. 
The stunning plus-sized model straddled a jet ski in a bright red swimsuit. 
The high-legged one piece flashed Ashley's famous bum as she threw herself into the water sports. 
The ANTM judge has managed to beat the odds and become one of the most popular supermodels in the world - and these shots show why. Ashley Graham straddled a jet ski in Miami (Photo: INSTAR Images) The model flaunted her best angles (Photo: INSTAR Images) 
Ashley smoldered for the camera while taking an athletic stance on the jet ski. 
The model's brunette hair flew in the wind as she gave the photographer a variety of angles to work with. 
After doing her modelling onshore, Ashley took to the waves to enjoy the open sea. Ashley enjoyed the waves (Photo: INSTAR Images) The model worked hard on set (Photo: INSTAR Images) 
She took a speedy turn in the waves before returning to shore. 
Ashley looked right at home on the beach as she laughed and frolicked in the waves. 
Last week, Ashley was spotted attending Maxmara Women's runway show at Milan Fashion Week , where she made sure to have all eyes on her in an eye-popping outfit. The model looked at home on the beach (Photo: INSTAR Images) Ashley used the jet ski (Photo: INSTAR Images) 
Ashley hit headlines last month when she slammed criticism aimed at her first ever US Vogue magazine cover, with some sceptics making accusations of photoshopping and more . 
The star's pose in the snap sees her as the only model with her hand resting on her leg, with one critic writing: "Find this quite galling. Why is Ashley Graham the only one covering her thigh? (Photo: Inez and Vinoodh/Vogue) 
Many accuse the publication of editing the image to make Ashley – who is a size 16 – appear slimmer - with some fans pointing out that Gigi’s hand and arm looks “too long” as if it had been edited to cover up Ashley. 
Another noted it could have been Ashley's own arm around herself, while she cleared up the pose in a comment on Instagram. 
"I chose to pose like that," she clarified. "No one told me to do anything." Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
